segments.text: Why ? Isn't it obvious ? First you impose way too much on me , and I'm tired away . Second , you stood me up on the Valentine's Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry for that , but I sent you several messages to explain , my mom was seriously ill , and I had to look afer her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I ended up with finding out lady that night , that you were with other girl at cafe near your home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've got so many cousins . I called you later that night . But you didn't have the guts to answer the phone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't take my cellphone with me at that time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know you don't hear me right know , please calm down . Anyway , I don't wanna part . I'll drop by tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , don't , I don't want to see you anymore . Don't ever call me again .
segments.speaker: S1
